pages.text: 75|20|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo musrikon mepindored]! Balki dunjo [-i zudguzar]-ro dust medored
75|21|Va oxiratro raho mekuned
75|22|On ruz cehrahoe toza [va sodoʙ] ast
75|23|Ba suji Parvardigoras menigarad
75|24|Va dar on ruz cehrahoe aʙus [va darhamkasida] ast
75|25|Jaqin dorad, ki oseʙe kamarsikan ʙa u merasad
75|26|Ore, cun [con] ʙa gulugohas ʙirasad
75|27|Va gufta savad: «Ci kasest, ki afsun ʙixonad? [Va uro nacot dihad]
75|28|Va jaqin kunad, ki zamoni cudoi [az dunjo] ast
75|29|Va [kor ʙolo girad va] soqho[-i pojas az saxtii con dodan] ʙa ham pecad
75|30|Dar on ruz masiri hama ʙa suji Parvardigorat xohad ʙud
75|31|Pas, [munkiri meod] na tasdiq karda va na namoz guzoridaast
75|32|Balki [Qur'onro] takziʙ kard va [az imon] ru gardond
75|33|Sipas xiromon ʙa suji xonavodaas ʙozgast
75|34|Voj ʙar tu! Pas, voj ʙar tu
75|35|Boz ham voj ʙar tu! Pas, voj ʙar tu
75|36|Ojo inson gumon mekunad, ki [ʙe hadaf va ʙiduni hisoʙ va cazo] ʙa xud raho mesavad
75|37|Ojo [u] nutfae az mani naʙud, ki [dar rahim] rexta mesavad
75|38|On goh ʙa surati xuni ʙasta daromad va [Alloh taolo uro] ofarid va durustu ustuvor soxt
75|39|Sipas az u du zavci naru moda padid ovard
75|40|Ojo [cunin Ofaridgore] qodir nest, ki murdagonro [duʙora] zinda kunad
76|1|Jaqinan, zamoni tulonie ʙar inson guzast, ki cize [muhimmu] qoʙili zikr naʙud
76|2|Ba rosti, Mo insonro az nutfai muxtalit [omexta]-e ofaridem, uro meozmoem. Pas, uro sunavovu ʙino qaror dodem
76|3|Hamono Mo rohro ʙa u nison dodem, xoh siposguzor ʙosad jo nosipos
76|4|Ba rosti, Mo ʙaroi kofiron zancirho va ʙandho va otasi suzon muhajjo kardaem
76|5|Be gumon, nakukoron [dar ʙihist] az come menusand, ki omexta ʙa kofur ast
